title: What is this bullshit?
body:
So a few hours ago while I was in champ select, the servers decided to throw me off and disconnect me from everything and when i relogged I had a 5 minute wait timer and I lost 3 LP which made it more annoying because that game we would've definitely won and I lost the next game because some people do not understand how to play.

I decide to queue up again and guess what, HERE'S A GUY WHO DECIDED TO INSTALOCK AND TROLL AND PULLED OUT CLARITY AND CLAIRVOYANCE AND GUESS WHAT, THE OTHER IDIOTS STAYED IN THE CHAMP PICK EVEN THOUGH HE SPECIFICALLY SAID HE WAS FEEDING AND NONE OF THEM DECIDED TO DODGE SO I DID IT MYSELF.

I LOG BACK ON AND GUESS WHAT I SEE.

A FUCKING 30 MINUTE WAIT TIMER? BECAUSE YOU KICK ME OFF YOUR SERVERS AND THEN I DODGE A GAME TO SAVE A FEW IDIOTS FROM A TROLL?

WHY IS THIS A MECHANIC IN THIS GAME?

replies.body:
Well, this is the risk that is inherently there in the idea of solo queuing. 

Much like say, Dark Souls' pvp/invading aspect, when you open to let people invade you to duel, you also open the possibility of letting d1ckheads running around in your game too, as no one can guarantee that you would always run into decent human beings when you are surfing the matchmaking system solo.

Yes I get that it's pretty darn unpleasant to stumble upon tards when you just wanna sit down and enjoy a couple of matches, and those who ruin it for everybody else should absolutely get the punishment they clearly deserve. 

But really though, imagine if they are really trying to remove this kind of incidents, which most likely would need to implement a kick vote of some sort. What that would also introduce into the game besides the benefit of less queue trolls would be of course, general bullying where people literally lolking his teammates and kick until they get the perfect roll.

That wouldn't be ideal either, hence the rule of thumb in this type of game should always remain as:

**"The real fun lies in premades and ranked 5s."**

In solo queues, anything can happen and frankly I am afraid there isn't much that can be done about them without either being a little too extreme or introducing other problems.

Trust me this stupid stuff happens throughout the whole of the elo scale. which means it never stops. Unfortunately, I am not in gold like u so i get paired with worse players than this. You can get the ignorant people, the selfish people, the afks, the smarta**, the "i cant look at the minimap" people and the "Ahri ADC is still viable" pple. See there are so many categories of players, its hard to avoid them. However it is what happens when you go through solo/duo queue. 

See, people and there mentality in Solo/Duo queue are "i can't think about others, only myself". It doesn't help when this game is team based oriented as it just stuffs up the whole system. Man... I can't say anything else to you apart from this is the way League is. But lets be reall, DotA's community is worse.
